report_data.Post or Account Link: "Why are we even helping refugees who never helped us

classification:
After analyzing the post, I classify it as:
Sectarian Incitement 

The post implies that refugees (likely Syrian refugees) are being helped, but the speaker believes they never helped "us" (which implies a sectarian or religious identity). This is a clear example of sectarian incitement, as it promotes division and resentment based on religious identity.
